subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s doubles team of Marcelo Melo and Bruno Soares beat the top-ranked team of Mike and Bob Bryan, 7-6 (6), 6-7 (7), 6-4, 3-6, 6-3, in Jacksonville, Fla.
snippet: Brazil’s doubles team of Marcelo Melo and Bruno Soares beat the top-ranked team of Mike and Bob Bryan, 7-6 (6), 6-7 (7), 6-4, 3-6, 6-3, in Jacksonville, Fla.
